title: BOWEN
verses: Master and Lord, ’tis good to be here,
Guided by thee to joy-crowned height
Where we man’s perfect sonship see
Safe and secure in radiant light.
Light of the world, ’tis good to hold fast
To the clear vision thou hast shown;
So shall this vision gently mold
Our lives more closely to thine own.
Thou art the Way, we know that the truth
Shown on the mountain here above,
Still in thy light’s triumphant glow
Through all earth’s valleys we can prove.
